name: ilp-framework
description: The Intelligent Liquidity Provisioning (ILP) Framework V2 for Uniswap V3 pools is an advanced system that leverages agent-based modeling (ABM) and reinforcement learning (RL) to optimize liquidity provisioning strategies. Building on the success of V1, this version introduces a suite of enhancements aimed at providing more accurate simulations, improved decision-making capabilities, and an efficient inference process. Additionally, V2 features a Django app for easy interaction with the framework through API endpoints.
